rows.label: bf05270100_0010
rows.name: Worrying isn't good for your skin, you know?

rows.label: bf05270100_0020
rows.name: A Driver and Blade are one in body and soul.

rows.label: bf05270100_0030
rows.name:
The one who told me that was
your other self, though?

rows.label: bf05270100_0040
rows.name: Hikari-chan did?

rows.label: bf05270100_0050
rows.name:
Although, it was 500 years ago,
so maybe you've forgotten?

rows.label: bf05270100_0060
rows.name: (Ah! I did say that, I definitely said that.)

rows.label: bf05270100_0070
rows.name:
(So it's true?
But how could she possibly remember...)

rows.label: bf05270100_0080
rows.name:
...You're wondering how I could remember
words from so long ago?

rows.label: bf05270100_0090
rows.name: What's this?

rows.label: bf05270100_0100
rows.name: It's like... my diary, you see.

rows.label: bf05270100_0110
rows.name:
It's the only way for "my future self" to know
who I was.

rows.label: bf05270100_0120
rows.name:
When Blades return to their Core and 
resonate again, they lose all memories from before.

rows.label: bf05270100_0130
rows.name: A Blade's lifespan is eternal.

rows.label: bf05270100_0140
rows.name:
But the time we can exist as individuals
is far shorter than a human's.

rows.label: bf05270100_0150
rows.name:
There are many Blades who, like me, try to record
their time and their previous selves.

rows.label: bf05270100_0160
rows.name: ...Even though we know it's meaningless.

rows.label: bf05270100_0170
rows.name: Once we return to the Core, our whereabouts change.

rows.label: bf05270100_0180
rows.name:
Even carefully recorded records
are lost along with our memories.

rows.label: bf05270100_0190
rows.name:
Perhaps I'm fortunate that my location is fixed as the 
Empire's treasure and that official records of me remain.

rows.label: bf05270100_0200
rows.name: Kagutsuchi...

rows.label: bf05270100_0210
rows.name:
I can only imagine
what your true intentions are.

rows.label: bf05270100_0220
rows.name: But, Rex is your Driver.

rows.label: bf05270100_0230
rows.name:
If you acknowledge him, 
then tell him everything about yourself.

rows.label: bf05270100_0240
rows.name: If you can't do that...

rows.label: bf05270100_0250
rows.name: You shouldn't be his Blade.

rows.label: bf05270100_0270
rows.name: If you care about him, it's even more important.

rows.label: bf05270100_0280
rows.name:
You might be rejected if you tell the truth.
I understand that fear.

rows.label: bf05270100_0290
rows.name: But, without being told the truth...

rows.label: bf05270100_0300
rows.name:
...you're just storing up pain for later,
not making it easier.

rows.label: bf05270100_0310
rows.name:
The way you say that...
You really do see right through me.

rows.label: bf05270100_0320
rows.name:
Well, of course.
We've been worthy opponents since 500 years ago...

rows.label: bf05270100_0330
rows.name: And we're both Blades, after all.
